English: Although some scholars argue that the civilization should be referred to as the Indus-Sarasvati civilization, as it also existed in the basins of the now dried-up Sarasvati River, while others refer to it as the Harappan civilization, after Harappa, the first of its sites to be excavated in the 1920s.
